WItem.en-US: Please fill in all the fields.
Unable to sign in the user because station already has a owner.
WItem.zh-TW: 無法登入使用者因為Station已經在為另一個使用者服務

WItem.en-US: An error occurred when sign off Waveface Station.
You need to first uninstall Waveface Station to proceed. Uninstall now?
WItem.zh-TW: 您必須移除舊的Waveface主程式後, 才能安裝新的。

WItem.en-US: Waveface station service seems not running. Please start it and try again.
WItem.zh-TW: Waveface station服務尚未啟動 請啟動該服務並再試一次

WItem.en-US: Unable to connect to Waveface Cloud. Please check network connectivity and try again
WItem.zh-TW: 無法連線到Waveface Cloud 請檢查網路是否正常並再試一次

WItem.en-US: Unable to sign up station with Waveface Cloud for unidentified reason. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 因為無法辨識的錯誤無法登錄這台Station 請再試一次
